text:
Sb. close, closely  
close 接近，靠近；closely 紧紧地，紧紧地  
closely connected, stand close  

87. it, sick  
it 的表示法，sick 先，先有词，a sick boy  

88. good, well  
good 形容词，well 副词，但指身体状况是那样的，He is well again.  

89. quiet, silent, still  
quiet 安静的，可以发出小的声音；silent 不发出声音，但可以动；still 完全不动，完全无声的，He stood there still, 他站在那里，一动不动，也不说话  

90. hard, hardly  
hard 努力，hardly 几乎不，work hard. I can hardly believe it.  

91. able, capable  
able 与不定式 to do 连用，capable 与 let 连用，He is capable of doing ...  

92. almost, nearly  
二者均为“几乎，差不多”和否定词连用用 almost，almost nobody.  

93. late, lately  
late 迟，late 最近，近来，I haven't seen him lately.  

94. living, alive, live, lively  
living 活着的，live 为活着的；living 表示动词；alive 表示名词，表示可居住的，live 只能做定语；lively 表示活泼的。  
all the living people = all the people alive  

95. excited, exciting  
excited 使人兴奋的，exciting 令人兴奋的。  
I'm excited. The news is exciting.  

96. deep, deeply  
deep 深的，deeply 深深地
